pullrequest.title: Fix Issue #40: Add textinput to install requirements

content.raw: There is a `from tabdelim import ... ` in common.py, which makes most of the tools crush with an ImportError. This package is a dependency of Genomedata, but this is not a requirement for Segtools. The package is really small so it doesn't hurt to add it as a dependency.
content.html: There is a from tabdelim import ... in common.py, which makes most of the tools crush with an ImportError. This package is a dependency of Genomedata, but this is not a requirement for Segtools. The package is really small so it doesn't hurt to add it as a dependency.
